gw.document

Class DocumentsUtilBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.document.DocumentsUtilBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocumentsHelper, DocumentsUtilBase

    public abstract class DocumentsUtilBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper methods for the Document-related UI pages.
    Author:
    bjohnson

    • Method Detail

      • showEditButtons

        public static boolean showEditButtons()
        Checks to see if the Edit/Upload buttons should be displayed, and caches the result, since it depends on config parameters and thus won't change without a server restart.
        Returns:
        true if the Edit/Upload buttons should be displayed on the Documents list pages, false otherwise

      • showEditButtons

        public static boolean showEditButtons(Document document)
        Checks to see if the Edit/Upload buttons should be displayed, and caches the result, since it depends on config parameters and thus won't change without a server restart. It also will check the document entity to see if it is managed by DMS
        Parameters:
        document - document entity to check
        Returns:
        true if the Edit/Upload buttons should be displayed on the Documents list pages, false otherwise

                                        IDocumentTemplateDescriptor descriptor,

      • renderDocumentContents

        public static void renderDocumentContents(DocumentCreationInfo documentCreationInfo,
                          DocumentContentsInfo docInfo)
        Render the document contents which correspond to the document creation process encapsulated in the given DocumentCreationInfo object. The rendering may stream the contents directly back to the user's machine, or create a temporary file, or follow another process, depending on the contents of the DocumentContentsInfo. See IDocumentProductionBase for more information on document contents.
        Parameters:
        documentCreationInfo - The encapsulated information about the current document creation process.
        docInfo - The results of the document contents creation.

      • renderDocumentContentsDirectly

        public static void renderDocumentContentsDirectly(java.lang.String fileName,
                                  DocumentContentsInfo docInfo)
        Render the given document contents directly back to the user's browser, rather than creating a temporary file on the user's machine.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The filename to be used.
        docInfo - The contents of the document to be displayed.

      • isDocumentEditable

        public static boolean isDocumentEditable(Document document)
        Returns true if the contents of the given DocumentBase entity are being edited locally by the user, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        document - The DocumentBase entity whose edibility is to be determined.
        Returns:
        True if the contents of the given DocumentBase entity are being edited locally by the user, false otherwise.

      • getMimeTypes

        public static java.util.List getMimeTypes()

        Returns:
        List of supported MIME types

        Parameters:
        mimeType - MIME type
        Returns:
        Description for the provided MIME type

      • deserializeXml

        public static java.lang.Object deserializeXml(java.io.InputStream xml,
                              IEntityType type)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the entity deserialized from the input stream. Note that this is mean for Document and therefore all created beans will be marked as non persisting.
        Parameters:
        xml - the input stream
        type - the type expected field or undefined field)
        Returns:
        an object of that type if it exists
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if errors in decoding document, or if the document is missing required fields

      • createNewDocument

        public static KeyableBean createNewDocument(Bundle bundle,
                            IEntityType type)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a new document entity, this bypasses creation permission.
        Parameters:
        bundle - a bundle to create the document in, must be writable
        type - the type of entity to create
        Returns:
        a new document entity
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - on failure to create new document

      • deserializeXmlTo

        public static java.lang.Object deserializeXmlTo(java.io.InputStream xml,
                                IEntityType type)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Deprecated. this is the old version for people that are relying on this behaviour otherwise use deserializeXml
        Returns the entity deserialized from the input stream.
        Parameters:
        xml - the input stream
        type - the type expected field or undefined field)
        Returns:
        an object of that type if it exists
        Throws:

      • serializeDocumentAsXML

        public static java.io.InputStream serializeDocumentAsXML(Document document)
                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the entity serialized as a string. This currently permits the serialization of incomplete document metadata, i.e., missing required fields.
        Parameters:
        document - the document to convert to a string
        Returns:
        the object serialized to a string
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on failure to serialize document

      • serializeDocumentToXMLString

                                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. for customers who need to keep using the old method
        Returns the entity serialized as a string. This currently permits the serialization of incomplete document metadata, i.e., missing required fields.
        Parameters:
        document - the document to convert to a string
        Returns:
        the object serialized to a string
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on failure to serialize document

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • loadTemplateDescriptorForUI

        public static IDocumentTemplateDescriptor loadTemplateDescriptorForUI(java.lang.String templateId,
                                                      ILocale locale)
        Load the document template descriptor with given template id and locale. It will return null if the template id is null or empty
        Parameters:
        templateId - template ID
        locale - locale
        Returns:
        template descriptor with the given template id in the provided locale.
        Throws:
        com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - for any plugin exception

      • loadTemplateDescriptor

        public static IDocumentTemplateDescriptor loadTemplateDescriptor(java.lang.String templateId,
                                                 ILocale locale)
        Load the document template descriptor with given template id and locale. It will not check if the template id is null
        Parameters:
        templateId - template id, null value will be passed to the plugin
        locale - locale of the template
        Returns:
        descriptor
